sessions.b: secureth thy account by changing thy passw'rd and using 2FA.

bots.public_bot_desc: Wheth'r to alloweth oth'r us'rs to inviteth this bot.

feedback.bug_desc: View currently factious bug rep'rts h're.
feedback.issue_desc: To holp us m're easily triage issues, thee can maketh an issue on GitHub.

descriptions.locale: This shall sync thy currently chosen language.
descriptions.theme: This shall sync thy chosen theme, colours and any custom CSS.

audio.tip_retry: Thee didn't giveth the p'rmission to access thy microphone, prithee {{retryBtn}}.

prompt.confirm_leave_long: Thee wonneth't beest able to rejoin unless thou art re-invit'd.
prompt.confirm_close_dm_long: Thee can re-open t lat'r but 'twill disappeareth on both sides.
prompt.unfriend_user_long: Thee may not beest able to talketh to those folk again until thee addeth those folk backeth.

special.requires_online: Thee needeth to beest online to view this.

misc.no_sending: Thee has't not p'rmission to sendeth messages in this channel.

error.DeniedNotification: Thee did deny notification access, checketh page settings.
error.ReachedMaximumBots: Thee've hath reached the maximum amount of bots.
